400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

post.description:
Creates a new data product with specified metadata, datasets, and governance information.
Use this endpoint to package related datasets into a governed, discoverable asset.
Requires create permissions in the target space.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

get.description:
Retrieves the details of the specified data product, including name, description, associated datasets, key contacts, and activation status.
Requires read access to the Data Product.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

patch.description:
Partially updates an existing data product using JSON Patch operations.
Use this endpoint to modify properties such as name, description, datasets, tags, or key contacts.
Changes are tracked in the data product changelog.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

delete.description:
Permanently removes a data product from the tenant.
This action cannot be undone and does not affect the underlying datasets.
Requires delete permissions for the data product.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

post.description:
Activates a data product for publishing and consumption.
Once activated, the data product becomes discoverable and accessible to authorized users.
Requires publish permissions and valid data product configuration.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

post.description: Deactivates a data product, preventing it from being consumed by other services or users.

200.description: Documentation exported successfully in Markdown format.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

get.description:
Exports data product documentation in Markdown format.
Use this endpoint to generate documentation for sharing or archiving.
Requires read access to the data product.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

post.description:
Moves a data product from its current space to a different space.
Use this endpoint to reorganize data products across workspaces or governance domains.
Requires delete permissions in the source space and create permissions in the target space.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

409.description: The input request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated history of all notable changes made to a data product.
Each changelog entry captures the operation type, affected property, and timestamp.
Use this endpoint to track the history of changes or data product evolution over time.

400.description: The request is in incorrect format.

401.description: User does not have valid authentication credentials.

403.description: User does not have access to the resource.

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Retry the request.

post.description:
Generates a URL to access a third-party provider's user interface.
Use this endpoint to integrate external services with your data product.

DataProductIdPath.name: dataProductId
DataProductIdPath.description: Unique identifier of the data product. Must be a valid GUID assigned when the data product was created.

LimitOptionalInQuery.name: limit
LimitOptionalInQuery.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

SortOptionalInQuery.name: sort
SortOptionalInQuery.description:
Sort order for changelog entries. Use `+createdAt` for oldest first or `-createdAt` for newest first.
Prefix with `+` for ascending or `-` for descending order. Default: -createdAt.

name.description: Name of the data product to activate.

items.description: List of tags for the data product.

description.example: This is an example data product.
description.description: A description of the data product.
description.x-size-message: The description should be set with a maximal length of 1024 characters

oneOf.description: Value is expected to be null or a string if the path is either /name, /description, /readMe or /spaceId.
value is expected to be null or an array of object if the path is /keyContacts.

name.description: Display name of the data product.

items.description: Individual tag for the data product.

tags.description: List of tags for the data product.
tags.x-field-extra-annotation: @jakarta.validation.constraints.Size(max = 50, message = "tags: must contain at most {max} items")

readMe.example: This is an example readme for the Data Product.
readMe.description: A readme of the Data Product.
readMe.x-size-message: The readMe must be set with a maximal length of 100000 characters

description.example: This is an example Data Product.
description.description: A description of the Data Product.
description.x-size-message: The description should be set with a maximal length of 1024 characters

keyContacts.description: List of key contacts for the data product.

CreateDataProductRequest.description: Request payload for creating a data product.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this changelog entry was created in ISO 8601 format.

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who made these changes.

qri.description: Qlik Resource Identifier (QRI) uniquely identifying the data product across the platform.

mainId.description: Primary identifier used for main data product reference.

readMe.description: Documentation in Markdown format providing detailed information about the data product.

ownerId.description: Identifier of the user who owns the data product and is responsible for governance.

activated.description: Indicates whether the data product is currently activated for consumption.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the data product was created in ISO 8601 format.

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who created the data product.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent update in ISO 8601 format.

updatedBy.description: Identifier of the user who last updated the data product.

activatedAt.description: Timestamp when the data product was most recently activated in ISO 8601 format.

activatedOn.description: List of target environments or platforms where the data product is activated.

items.description: List of dataset IDs for which API consumption is enabled

role.description: Role of the key contact in the Data Product.

KeyContact.description: Represents a designated contact person for a data product, optionally with their role.

oneOf.description: Value is expected to be null or a string if the path is either /name, /description, or /readMe
Value is expected to be null or an array of object if the path is /keyContacts

region.description: The region the tenant is hosted in

tenant.description: Name of the tenant that will be called
